pr_title: DPC-1119: Stuck jobs fixes: change exceptions in ResourceFetcher; remove RetryTransformer

timeline.bodyText: Define and throw a dedicated exception instead of using a generic one.

timeline.message: Replace job queue failures with runtime exceptions to cause jobs to complete with operation outcomes
Add test to confirm job completes with OperationOutcome when two Patients match provided MBI
Add new Patient not in BFD to Postman test
Error message tweaks, continuing to work on Postman improvements
Remove env vars from docker-compose.yml that are pulled from local.env file
MockBlueButtonClient getPatient fix; logging and comments fixes in ResourceFetcher
Update Postman test to expect error file
One more Postman adjustment for number of Patients

timeline.bodyText: Great job on the logging here and elsewhere. We're now returning the correct exception. 💯
timeline.author: ronaldheft-usds

timeline.bodyText: Great job updating the tests without retrying.

timeline.bodyText: New test looks great, and is asserting a COMPLETED state.
